titles.title: A bill for the relief of Raheela Naz Khan.
A bill for the relief of Raheela Naz Khan.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Raheela Naz Khan to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
